snippet: Michael Pineda, who missed last season after shoulder surgery, began a 30-day rehabilitation assignment with four and a third innings for the Tampa Yankees.
abstract: New York Yankees pitcher Michael Pineda, who missed 2012 season after shoulder surgery, begins 30-day rehabilitation assignment with four and a third innings for the Tampa Yankees.
lead_paragraph: Michael Pineda, who missed last season after shoulder surgery, began a 30-day rehabilitation assignment with four and a third innings for the Tampa Yankees.

headline.seo: Yankees’ Michael Pineda Sharp in First Rehab Start
headline.main: Pineda Focuses on Control in First Step Toward Yanks
headline.print_headline: Pineda Focuses on Control In First Step Toward Yanks
